DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate safety tolerability ANX-042 administer continuous intravenous ( IV ) infusion healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: ANX-042 Healthy Volunteer Dose Escalation Study
DOC.detailed_description: Each participant receive total two , approximately 12-hour continuous infusion ANX-042 one 12-hour continuous infusion placebo , 36-hour washout period treatment .

One two upright value must obtain 3 5 minute upright arm passively support maintain brachial artery heart level Abnormal 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) interfere proper measurement QTinterval , opinion Investigator , increase risk participate study Elevated BP ( > 140/90 mmHg ) posture , confirm repeat measurement Current use ( within 7 day first dose ) expect need concomitant medication hemodynamic effect include : nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDS ) , decongestant , BP medication , diuretic , monoamine oxidase inhibitor , norepinephrine uptake inhibitor ( example , attentiondeficit disorder medication , antidepressant ) erectile dysfunction medication . Medications low likelihood hemodynamic renal effect permit ( example , acetaminophen , vitamin , stable thyroid hormone , gastritis therapy , antihistamine , topical medication , et cetera ) approval Investigator Evidence current recent use know drug abuse and/or positive finding urinary drug screen History average weekly alcohol intake exceed 21 unit per week ( 1 unit equal ( = ) 12 ounce ( oz ) 360 milliliter ( mL ) beer ; 5 oz 150 mL wine ; 1.5 oz 45 mL distilled spirit ) , unwilling stop alcohol consumption duration study History regular smoking > 5 cigarette , cigar and/or pipe bowl tobacco per day Known allergy nesiritide ( Natrecor ) History blood donation > 500 mL within one month , plasma donation within 14 day , first dosing Are currently enrol , complete discontinue within last 30 day , clinical trial involve investigational product concurrently enrol type medical research judge scientifically medically compatible study Are investigator site personnel directly affiliate study immediate family member .
